TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Constants extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 建立允許使用者引動 ASP.NET 事件處理常式的 UI 項目，並提供可將使用者輸入從 UI 項目貼回伺服器的方法。

span.span: Creates a UI element that allows user invocation of ASP.NET event handlers and provides a way to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述的唯讀類別的成員，您可以使用。The following table describes the read-only class members you can use. |成員Member|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |AlternatingItemTemplateTagAlternatingItemTemplateTag|包含 AlternatingItem 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the AlternatingItem template.| |ContentTemplateTagContentTemplateTag|包含 Content 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Content template.| |DefaultSessionsStateHistorySizeDefaultSessionsStateHistorySize|包含記錄堆疊的預設深度。Contains the default depth of the history stack.| |EventArgumentIDEventArgumentID|與回傳事件相關聯的引數。The argument associated with the postback event.| |EventSourceIDEventSourceID|包含事件目標的查詢字串名稱 (產生回傳的控制項)。Contains the query String name of the event target (the control that generated the postback).| |FooterTemplateTagFooterTemplateTag|包含 Footer 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Footer template.| |FormIDPrefixFormIDPrefix|包含 URL 中的表單前置詞。Contains the prefix of a form in a URL.| |HeaderTemplateTagHeaderTemplateTag|包含 HeaderTemplate 的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the HeaderTemplate.| |ItemDetailsTemplateTagItemDetailsTemplateTag|包含 ItemDetails 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the ItemDetails template.| |ItemTemplateTagItemTemplateTag|包含 Item 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Item template.| |LabelTemplateTagLabelTemplateTag|包含 Label 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Label template.| |OptimumPageWeightParameterOptimumPageWeightParameter|包含預設頁面權數。Contains the default page weight.| |PagePrefixPagePrefix|包含頁碼分隔符號 (Delimiter)，用以確保在回傳中適當編列頁面。Contains a page number delimiter used to ensure proper page numbering in a postback.| |ScreenCharactersHeightParameterScreenCharactersHeightParameter|包含螢幕上的字元高度預設值。Contains the default for the height of the characters on the screen.| |ScriptTemplateTagScriptTemplateTag|包含 Script 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Script template.| |SelectionListSpecialCharacterSelectionListSpecialCharacter|包含 cHTML 的 CheckBox ID 所用的字元。Contains the character used in CheckBox IDs for cHTML.| |SeparatorTemplateTagSeparatorTemplateTag|包含 Separator 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Separator template.| |SymbolProtocolSymbolProtocol|包含字元，用以代表 i-mode 或 J-Phone 符號配置的開頭。Contains the characters used to denote the beginning of an i-mode or J-Phone symbol scheme.| |UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableUniqueFilePathSuffixVariable|包含唯一檔案路徑尾碼的查詢字串名稱。Contains the query String name of the unique file path suffix.| |UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqualUniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqual|包含唯一檔案路徑尾碼的查詢字串名稱，但不含等號。Contains the query String name of the unique file path suffix, but no equal sign.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks AlternatingItemTemplateTagAlternatingItemTemplateTag 包含 AlternatingItem 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the AlternatingItem template. ContentTemplateTagContentTemplateTag 包含 Content 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Content template. DefaultSessionsStateHistorySizeDefaultSessionsStateHistorySize 包含預設 SessionsState 記錄大小。Contains the default SessionsState history size. EventArgumentIDEventArgumentID 包含事件引數識別碼。Contains the Event Argument ID. EventSourceIDEventSourceID 包含事件的來源識別碼。Contains the Event Source ID. FooterTemplateTagFooterTemplateTag 包含 Footer 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Footer template. FormIDPrefixFormIDPrefix 包含表單識別碼前置詞。Contains the Form ID prefix. HeaderTemplateTagHeaderTemplateTag 包含標頭範本的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Header template. ItemDetailsTemplateTagItemDetailsTemplateTag 包含 ItemDetails 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the ItemDetails template. ItemTemplateTagItemTemplateTag 包含 Item 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Item template. LabelTemplateTagLabelTemplateTag 包含 Label 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Label template. OptimumPageWeightParameterOptimumPageWeightParameter 包含最佳頁面權重參數。Contains the optimum page weight parameter. PagePrefixPagePrefix 包含頁面的前置詞。Contains the page prefix. ScreenCharactersHeightParameterScreenCharactersHeightParameter 包含螢幕字元高度參數。Contains the screen characters height parameter. ScriptTemplateTagScriptTemplateTag 包含 Script 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Script template. SelectionListSpecialCharacterSelectionListSpecialCharacter 包含選取項目清單的特殊字元。Contains the selection list special character. SeparatorTemplateTagSeparatorTemplateTag 包含 Separator 樣板的標記名稱。Contains the tag name for the Separator template. SymbolProtocolSymbolProtocol 包含符號通訊協定。Contains the symbol protocol. UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableUniqueFilePathSuffixVariable 包含唯一的檔案路徑後置詞的變數。Contains the unique file path suffix variable. UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqualUniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqual 包含唯一的檔案路徑後置詞的變數不含等號。Contains the unique file path suffix variable without equal.
